Description:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel San Sebastian in Acacias, you''ll be within the region of Iglesia Principal and Parque Nuevo Milenio.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 8 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. This guesthouse also features tour/ticket assistance and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.

Description:
Located just 1 km from the river in Acacias, this bright hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool and an on-site restaurant. Hotel Iraqua also features laundry services.

Each modern room at the property comes with tiled floors and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. They also have a private bathroom with a shower and toilet.

Local cuisine is served at the propertys on-site restaurant, while guests can find other dining options within 2 km of Hotel Iraqua.

Los Ocarros Biological Park can be reached in a 20-minute drive, and Vanguardia Airport in neighbouring Villavicencio is a 30-minute drive away.

Description:
Located just outside Acacías, Hotel Campestre Las Pampas offers tropical gardens, 5 outdoor swimming pools and a spa. The air-conditioned rooms feature free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and en suite bathrooms.

The hotels swimming pools include 1 natural pool, while the spa offers a sauna and Turkish bath. There is also a communal lounge and a poolside games area with a pool table, ping pong and chess.

A free daily breakfast is served at the Hotel Campestre Las Pampas. The on-site restaurant serves national and international cuisine.

Acacías Bus Station and the riverfront boulevard are within 4 km, while the business district is 5 km away and Villavicencio La Vanguardia Airport is 32 km away. Free parking is available at the hotel. Please inform Hotel TPR Campestre Las Pampas-Acacias in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property.

Palma Real Hotel Boutique is located in Acacías. The hotel boasts free WiFi access throughout and an on-site snack bar.

Simply furnished, each room here will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. The private bathroom also comes with a shower. Extras include linens, towels and a fan.

At Palma Real Hotel Boutique you will find a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and shops, found on the premises. Free parking is also provided.

Description:
Hotel La Mansion De Acacias features a bar, garden and terrace in Acacías. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All units at Hotel La Mansion De Acacias include air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Villavicencio is 30 km from the accommodation, while La Palmera is 36 km away. The nearest airport is La Vanguardia Airport, 33 km from Hotel La Mansion De Acacias.

Description:

Description:
Property Location
With a stay at New Western in Acacias, you'll be 13.5 mi (21.7 km) from Iglesia Principal and 13.6 mi (21.8 km) from Parque Nuevo Milenio. This guesthouse is 13.6 mi (21.9 km) from Castilla La Nueva Cultural House and 23.8 mi (38.4 km) from Llanabastos Market.

Rooms
Stay in one of 10 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water and portable fans, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this guesthouse include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a television in a common area.

Dining
Take advantage of the guesthouse's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily from 8 AM to 11 AM for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.

Located in the countryside, only 3 km from La Miel And Cabo Tiburon Capes, Hotel Doña Triny offers rooms with air conditioning and TV sets in Sapzurro. There is a restaurant, and half board is provided. The Panamanian border is a few kilometers away.

Bright and spacious, rooms at Doña Triny are decorated with exposed-brick walls. All of them have private bathrooms.

An American breakfast is served daily. Regional dishes can be enjoyed at the propertys restaurant.

Hotel Doña Triny is a few steps from the Catolica de Sapzurro church and 4 km from Narcisa Navas de Capurganá Airport.

HOTEL BAHÍA PINORROA has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a bar and shared lounge in Capurganá. Boasting a garden, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 600 metres from Capurganá Beach and around 1 km from Capurganá. The accommodation offers a hot tub, karaoke and family rooms.

At the hotel all rooms have a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, and a balcony with pool view.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play table tennis at HOTEL BAHÍA PINORROA.

Description:
Located 200 metres from the Caribbean Sea, this Capurganá lodge offers an outdoor swimming pool, stream room, bar and a restaurant. Free WiFi access is available.

Tacarcuna Lodges independent, cottage-type rooms are surrounded by gardens and feature air conditioning a terrace with hammock and a private bathroom with shower.

Relax in the hammocks and enjoy the Tacarcuna Lodges peaceful garden. There is also a shared lounge, while an array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including diving, snokelling, row boats and nautical bicycles.

The lodge is a 2.5 hour boat ride from the port of Turbo, Antioquia. It is a 1 hour and 10 minute flight from Medellin and 30 minutes by boat from Puerto Obaldia Airport in Panama. Airport shuttle services are available for an extra fee. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Located in Capurganá, Hospedaje Marazul Capurgana features a shared lounge. The accommodation features free WiFi.

An American breakfast is available daily at the hostel.

Address: Calle Del Muelle Capurgana Choco Calle Del Muelle
Description:
Located in Capurganá and with Capurganá Beach reachable within a few steps, Dive and Green Capurgana provides a garden, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The guest house features family rooms.

Every room is equipped with a private bathroom, while selected rooms include a balcony and others also provide guests with a mountain view. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Managed by a private host

Description:
With lake views, Hotel Cabañas El Paraíso is situated in Sapzurro and has a restaurant, free shuttle service, bar, garden and terrace. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property.

Every unit has a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

Guests at the lodge can enjoy an à la carte or a continental breakfast.

If you would like to discover the area, snorkelling is possible in the surroundings.

Playas Sapzurro is a few steps from Hotel Cabañas El Paraíso. Please inform Hotel Cabañas El Paraíso in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
HeadLine : In Acandi

Location : When you stay at Hotel Nautilos Trigana in Acandi, you ll be steps from Malpelo Fauna and Flora Sanctuary.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 19 guestrooms. Conveniences include fans, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Hotel Nautilos Trigana, or stop in at the grocery/convenience store. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to 10 AM.

CheckIn Instructions : Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed No onsite parking is available

Special Instructions : The front desk is open daily from 6 AM - 10 PM. This property doesn t offer after-hours check-in. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description:
Located 1 km from Aguachica city centre, Hotel Los Estoraques offers free Wi-Fi and a restaurant. Los Estorales park is a 90-minute drive and Gamarra is a 15-minute drive away.

Providing a tranquil environment, the rooms in Hotel Los Estoraques feature private bathrooms and cable TVs. Superior rooms offer air conditioning as well.

Guests at Hotel Los Estoraques are provided laundry services upon request.

Hotel Los Estoraques is 300 metres from Auguachica airport and 5 km from Hacaritama airport. Free private parking is possible on site.

Description:
Featuring a restaurant and an indoor swimming pool, Hotel D Leon Inn offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning in Aguachica. Free parking is provided. The Main Park is 1 km away.

Rooms at Hotel D Leon Inn are fitted with minibars and satellite TV. All of them have private bathrooms.

Regional specialties can be ordered at the propertys restaurant.
Hotel D Leon Inn is 200 metres from the bus stop and 3 hours from the airport by car.

Description:
Located in Aguachica in the Cesar Region, 30 km from Ocaña, Hotel Calle Real - INN features an outdoor pool and year-round outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a TV. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Rooms have a private bathroom.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Hotel Calle Real - INN in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Set in Aguachica, Hotel Imperial La Quinta has a terrace. All rooms boast a TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Hotel Imperial La Quinta in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Hotel Prado Country features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Aguachica. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hotel Prado Country also have a city view. The units at the accommodation feature air conditioning and a desk.

The nearest airport is Yariguies Airport, 189 km from Hotel Prado Country. Please inform Hotel Prado Country in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Centro Vacacional Lago Center is located in Aguazul. It has lush tropical gardens and free Wi-Fi.

Each room here features a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a shower and toilet. Some overlook the small river that runs through the property.

At Centro Vacacional Lago Center you will find a fitness centre, a games room and a childrens playground. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including hiking, billiards and table tennis.

Aguazul Town Centre can be reached in 10 minutes by car, while the city of Yopal is a 1-hour drive from the property.
